transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Baat kar rahe ho inki baat aapne cancel ki?
Customer: Main nahi baat ki main.
Executive: Aap?
Customer: Main nahi call ki.
Executive: Abhi nahi baat ki aapne? Whatsapp pe connect ki aapne?
Customer: Haan whatsapp pe connect kar lenge.
Executive: Uh, theek hai whatsapp pe connect kar lijiyega unka feedback mujhe bata dijiyega. Baaki inquiries jo hai aap whatsapp pe connect kar lijiyega aur wo uska response aapko zarur milega sir. I think matlab wo ho sakta hai aap busy ho to do teen din mein reply karte ho inquiries aati hai wo relevant hi aati hai sir mostly. Kyunki inhone agar dala inquiry to obviously kuch soch ke dala hoga. To inquiry ka response aapko mil jayega unko whatsapp pe connect kar lijiyega.
Aur wool ki jo maine category uski add kar di hai. Jo aapne naya product add kiya tha. To uske baare mein aapko show honi start ho jayegi kal baare mein.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Fir madam kab hogi ye batayein bhi humko samajh mein nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan sir?
Customer: Batayein madam jab plan khatam ho jayega tab show hoga?
Executive: Uh, sorry aapki voice clear nahi aa rahi hai. Ek minute rukiye ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Hmm hmm madam bata rahe the jaise jab plan khatam ho jayega tab hume milenge ye list ye bataiye aap.
Executive: List to maine kaha hai kya aapko ki jo aapki wool ki inquiry aa rahi thi to maine wool wali aapko search karke batai aur uski maine category bhi add kar di to wo aapko aani start ho jayengi ab.
Executive: Haan. Wo as a category aapne naya product add kiya tha usko photo wagera add ki thi but aapne category add karna bhool gaye the shayad. Baaki maine sab kuch ek aur cheez shayad uh D rank mein thi jiske baare mein aap consume kar rahe the. But as a product wo add nahi tha main batati hu kaun sa tha.
Executive: Haan runner carpet. Iski bhi baare mein consume kiye the kya aap?
Customer: Hmm kiya honge madam jo bhi milta hai sab kar lete hain.
Executive: Runner carpet bhi add karna hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi add mat kariye usko.
Executive: Add nahi karna?
Customer: Nahi. Bas wool carpet add kariye.
Executive: Haan?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan madam bataiye.
Executive: Sir main keh rahi hu chaar baare mein aapne uski consume ki thi usko add nahi karna hai?
Customer: Nahi madam add nahi karna hai kar dijiye karna ho to bas hum business milna start ho jaye kisi ka bhi mile.
Executive: Hmm theek hai wo aapke product line bhi nahi hai agar runner carpet to uski baare mein mat consume kijiyega aap. Main usko remove kar deti hu fir uski baare mein nahi aayegi.
Customer: Theek hai kar dijiye. Wo D rank wali aur ye jo aapne call kiya tha uske regarding fir se feedback aa gaya email pe wo bhi check kar lijiyega please.
Customer: Mere regarding aayega?
Customer: Nahi isko close mat kariye main isko open hi rehne dijiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi mera jo call gaya na abhi aapne call kiya tha 9696 se uske regarding maine aapko uh resolution diya hai wo uske regarding rahega. Haan aapko mil gaya hai aapko wool carpets ke baare mein aani start ho gayi hai plus aapko search hua tha category mein add tha uske wajah se nahi aa rahi thi. To uske regarding feedback usme milte rahega agar meri call se to.
Customer: Ye ye jo ticket ticket open kiye hain isko close mat kariyega.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Ye jo ticket open kiye hain isko close mat kariyega.
Executive: Nahi dekhiye wo wo mail aapko jayegi hi jayegi satisfaction ke liye kyunki aapne as a ticket wo open hua tha na sir ki aapko kya problem thi uski resolution mili ki nahi mili. To aapka yahi problem tha ki aapko uski nahi aa rahi hai baare mein.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam hamara problem ye hai ki hume business chahiye. Hume business nahi mila to hum kya close karenge isko close mat kariye roz hum phone karenge ab uske subah shaam.
Executive: Sir aapke business ke liye maine khud kitni der try kiya hai aap proper maine dekha hai ki aapne chaar ghante pehle ke baare mein consume kar rahe hain sab recent baare mein consume kar rahe hain aap to aap apne area ke baare mein consume karein. To abhi aapke pata hai aapke product line mein competitor bahut zyada hai maine aapko pehle bhi video meeting mein bhi saari cheeze show kiya tha ki aapke product line mein competitor bahut zyada hai visibility mein time lag jata hai sir cheh mahine saat mahine to mil jayega business aisa nahi hai ki aapko business nahi milega sir. Thoda time lagega.
Customer: Madam ye bataye kya ab mushkil se mushkil do mahine bacha hua hai.
Executive: Haan? Aath mahine to aise beet gaya.
Executive: Main ye keh rahi hu dekhiye maine aapko dikhaya tha aap jis product line mein deal kar rahe hain aapke jitne bhi competitor hai wo sab TS use kar rahe hain is wajah se thoda sa aapko competition zyada lag raha hai business thoda tough hai but aisa nahi ki milega hi nahi milega sir. TrustSeal wala maine aapko dikhaya tha open karke abhi Naksh Enterprises hai aap hi ke competitor hai Kamariya ke hi. To wo TS use kar rahe hain to aapke product line mein hai to aapka bhi.
Executive: Hai thoda sa abhi to competitor zyada hai but aapko visibility mein bhi time lagega abhi main aap pehle number pe dikh rahe hain Kamariya mein. To aap please contact kijiye buyer ko baat kijiye aur main ye maine aapko pehle bhi baat kiya aapne bataya tha ki aapko jo call aap jo buyer consume karein apni location se zyada kijiye Kamariya ke buyer consume kijiye apni location ke aas paas ke buyer.
Customer: Madam madam madam suniye pehle Kamariya mein to sabhi wahi kaam kar rahe hain to humse koi kyun kharidna chahega hume ye bataiye. Kamariya mein aapke product ki dekhiye Kamariya ki inquiry aayi hui hai aapko wo kyun kharidenge wo baat ye hai kyunki sir aapke product ki prices thodi si low hona aapke competitor ke according plus aapke product ki photo images bhi sahi hai to aap agar South ki buyer consume karenge to wo kyun convert hoga obviously usko transportation charge zyada dena padega.
Executive: Abhi turant abhi Kamariya ki buyer aayi hui hai to please check karke usko ek baar consume karke uska bhi feedback mujhe bata dijiyega. Ye hand carpet hai aur wool wali hai. Kamariya ka filter lagaiyega zara.
Customer: Around Kamariya. Ye eight hours pehle ka hai ye to.
Executive: Kamariya ka filter lagaiye. Upar jo maine aapko bataya tha location wala.
Customer: Haan wo to laga liye location.
Customer: Isme to eight hours bata raha hai.
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan sir bataiye. Haan haan haan.
Customer: Madam eight hour pehle ka hi hai ye.
Executive: Uh aath ghante pehle ki bilkul aap baat dekhiye kam se kam Kamariya ki baare mein aani start ho jayengi. Wo aapne check nahi kiya hai Kamariya ka filter laga ke aap check kijiyega aap isko consume kar lijiyega ek baar ye sold out abhi tak nahi hui hai to I think zyada buyer ne consume nahi kiya hai ya to usse proper baat nahi hui hai deal nahi hui hai warna sold out ho jati.
Executive: Isko consume kar lijiye plus Badhoi ki kijiyega. Aur Kamariya ki ek aur hai ye bhi kal aayi thi. Maine aapko bataya tha sir kya agar aap door ki baare mein consume karte hain to wo convert nahi honge kyunki unko transportation charge zyada padti hai. To koi bhi transportation charge kyun zyada dega bhale aapke prices kam na ho.
Executive: To aap Kamariya walon se contact kijiye wo zarur convert ho jayenge. Achha ye machine made hai aapka to handmade rehta hai. Dusra wala maine dekha. Handmade ek aur hai Badhoi ki hai. Aap Kamariya aur Badhoi do jagah ki baare mein consume kijiye. Uh please mera phone utha liya kijiye zara aap. Aap mera phone nahi uthate hain 9696 pe aap call kar dete hain kal hi maine aapko call kiya tha isi ke regarding.
Customer: Sure. Mera number save kar lijiye aap.
Customer: Madam aap ye nahi bataye hum aapko call karenge hum aapse ye baat baar baar kahenge aap sun lengi aap mujhe batayengi ek ek cheez ki aise kariye aise kariye hum aise karenge aur hume kuch milega nahi to 9696 pe call karna.
Executive: Dekhiye aisi baat hai wo bhi aap wo bhi call to mere paas hi aate hain aap 96 pe kariye chahe 56 pe kariye mere paas hi jayenge main aapke call dekhiye main agar agar effort nahi karti sir to main kehti ki theek hai ab main maine kuch mehnat nahi kiya main aapka product line bhi check karti thi kal hi maine D rank dekha runner wala maine kal hi aapko phone milaya lekin aap receive nahi kiye to fir maine aapko whatsapp pe bhi search karke karne ki koshish ki thi.
Customer: Madam aap ye matlab aap pareshan mat huiye mere liye bas mujhe business kaise bhi karke ek ek ek aad business de dijiye na mujhe matlab bharosa ho jaye ki haan IndiaMART pe bhi milte hain bas itna mujhe ho jaye bas ya to hum aapse bole the madam jaise kisi ko bhi agar business mil raha hai usse humse baat kara dijiye wo banda keh de ki haan bhai isse milta hai business milta hai tabhi hum mere andar santushti ho jayegi haan theek hai milta hai mujhe nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Ab main jaise keh rahi hu ki aapne abhi tak jitna bhi abhi consume kiya hai to South ki baare mein consume kiye hain aap apne nearby location ki ek baar baare mein consume karna start abhi bhi aapke agar main major cities check karu prefer location to Delhi, Mumbai, Lucknow, Banglore, Pune Uttar Pradesh aapki city as a prefer city nahi hui hai. Jaisa ki maine aapko bataya tha ki aap apne nearby location ke baare mein consume karte hain to wo zyada convert honge kyunki unko transportation charges zyada nahi dene hain. Aap consume kariye fir bataiye mujhe kam se kam ek hafta to direct aap apne nearby location ki consume kariye. Wahan bhi consume karke mujhe bataiye ki wahan bhi nahi mil rahi hai. Abhi tak jitna consume kiya aapne wo sab South wagera kiye hain Delhi, Mumbai, Pune ki wo nahi convert honge sir zyada wo apne koi bhi apne location mein lena chahega ya apne location se zyada de dungi.
Executive: Aap Badhoi ki kijiye Kamariya ki kijiye yahan pe aapko response nahi milta tab aap mujhe bataiye fir main aapko contact karti hu.
Customer: Madam is baat ka kya hum batayein.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai. Aapne consume kiya abhi Badhoi aur wahan ke Kamariya wale.
Customer: Haan bolenge hum consume bhi hum whatsapp pe bhi connect kar liye hain ab aur hi kya karein unke ghar chale jayein madam. Consume kiya aapne? Haan madam. Theek hai. Theek hai aap aise abhi jitni bhi baare mein aa rahi hain to aap ek do din aap apni locations ki baare mein consume kijiye usko unko contact kijiye wo nahi hoga na to agar aap online nahi lete hain to wo agar aas paas ke hain to wo aake visit bhi kar lenge ki haan theek hai aapki aap se baat karke aise apni dukaan pe aate hain IndiaMART se hi aapko jaante hain to aake visit bhi kar lenge unko trust bhi rahega. To fir aap apne location ke baare mein consume kijiye aur koi query? Baaki woolen wala maine as a category add kar diya hai wo bhi uske liye aani start ho jayegi.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Ab buyer ko aap apne whatsapp pe connect kiya hai waise connect rakhiye wo response karenge sir aisa nahi ki ekdam buyer response hi nahi karte sir aapke product line mein bhi business hai aur wo reply bhi karte hain sir. Kyunki agar agar wo reply nahi karte to aap bataye koi TS kyun lega suppose kisi ko business mil hi nahi raha hai to TrustSeal kyun use karein matlab wo kyun use karega iska matlab business mil raha hai tabhi to wo ja rahe hain aapke product line mein.
Executive: Kya boli madam? Uh sir business mil raha hai tabhi to wo ja rahe hain aapke product line mein higher services pe to aap use kijiye aapko business mil jayega aap khud kahenge ki ab yahan thoda time lagta hai aap apne nearby location ki use kijiye services aapko bhi business milna start ho jayega to aap khud higher services ke liye jayenge main nahi kahungi sir aapko. Dekhiye business milna start ho jaye.
Executive: To isko bhi mil jata hai na aapko chota mota bhi to fir aapko aani start ho jayenge sir. Thoda sa wo rating denge fir aapka response wagera bhi sara sahi rahega.
Executive: Hmm. Abhi aap apne location se regarding consume kijiyega.
Customer: Madam aap ye nahi kar sakte.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough business.

- Wants to know when leads will start showing.

- Expresses frustration with the lack of results.



Resolution:

- Executive added wool category to the product.

- Executive removed runner carpet category.

- Executive advised to consume nearby location leads.

- Executive explained the competition in the product line.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try consuming nearby leads.

- Customer to provide feedback after consuming leads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product category, trustseal
